html:
2026-0053
2026-01-30FINCustoms TariffOrder Amending the China Surtax Remission Order (2024), No. 2Order Amending the China Surtax Remission Order (2024), No. 2 in order to (1) add 9 items to Schedule 1, which remits surtaxes to any importer in respect of goods that have been determined to be in short supply, and update several existing product descriptions to better reflect tariff classifications and technical specifications; (2) change two items from product-specific relief to company-specific relief, as a domestic source of supply has been identified; and (3) extend the duration of remission for products listed in Schedule 1 and for eligible importers under Schedule 2 from December 31, 2025, to December 31, 2026.Registration: SOR/2026-0014 Publication Date: 2026-02-11
subject: Order Amending the China Surtax Remission Order (2024), No. 2
precis: Order Amending the China Surtax Remission Order (2024), No. 2 in order to (1) add 9 items to Schedule 1, which remits surtaxes to any importer in respect of goods that have been determined to be in short supply, and update several existing product descriptions to better reflect tariff classifications and technical specifications; (2) change two items from product-specific relief to company-specific relief, as a domestic source of supply has been identified; and (3) extend the duration of remission for products listed in Schedule 1 and for eligible importers under Schedule 2 from December 31, 2025, to December 31, 2026.
